Another Muslim related death just swept under the rug
A feud between two families erupted into a ‘bloodbath’ during the wedding of a young couple resulting in the death of a dad-of-two, it was reported.
Christian Marriot, known as Chris, was out for a post-Christmas walk with his wife and two young sons when he spotted a woman lying unconscious in the street in the Burngreave area of Sheffield.
As the 46-year-old stopped to provide first aid, a car smashed into them both at 50 mph, it is claimed.
Further details about what led to the tragedy on Wednesday have been revealed.
A celebration ceremony for the groom and the bride was taking place at the local mosque when her family – unhappy with the marriage – rushed to College Close in Sheffield to confront his relatives.
Witnesses claim there were cries of ‘your son is not good enough’ from the group, who had opted not to go to the ceremony, despite relatives of the groom saying the bride was seemingly happy with the match, the Daily Mail reported.
One resident who wished to remain anonymous said: ‘It was mayhem with people going absolutely crazy.
‘There was shouting and fighting in the street then a car sped along at 50mph and ploughed into the crowd.
Grumpyarse
